title: Consumer education: maintaining an automobile
brief_description: Several young auto owners are shown dealing with the maintenance and repair requirements of their cars. The aim is to inform the viewer of the importance of proper automobile servicing and repairing and to advise how these may be accomplished with economy, emphasising the fact that proper servicing can make owning a car a pleasure.
